body_html:
Almost, if by flattening you mean flattening the contiguous version of the tensor.
Currently the only requirement for point-wise operations is that the number of elements match, and the shape will be the one of the first input.

Almost, if by flattening you mean flattening the contiguous version of the tensor.
Currently the only requirement for point-wise operations is that the number of elements match, and the shape will be the one of the first input.
body:
Almost, if by flattening you mean flattening the contiguous version of the tensor.
Currently the only requirement for point-wise operations is that the number of elements match, and the shape will be the one of the first input.
